title: so laggy and FPS drops
body:
Ever since i updated to the beta client my FPS has dropped by half which is really shit since i only get 40-60FPS (dont judge - aint got a super pc to play on) and the champ select in ranked is so laggy to the point where the music cuts off for a 2secs... cant revert back to legacy client either cuz the button does nothing >_>
i hope this get fixed after beta ends

replies.body: I have the same problem as well. Only that I have like 5 or 10 fps in champ select, especially in ranked. Using a Macbook Pro Retina (Late 2013, 4GB RAM and core i5) with macOS Sierra.
i think i found a way to lessen the lag for now... i made my client resolution the smallest it can be in the settings. i dont lag as much in ranked queue but the words are tiny as fk.

Try disabling animation in the client and see if it helps. To disable animations:

Click the Settings icon on the top-right of your client.
Select _General_ on the left side of the menu.
Check _Disable Animation_.

http://i.imgur.com/EU8Mvmg.png?noredirect

{{champion:17}}
lmao i tried this and nothing changes... still laggy to the point where i auto dodge a ranked champ select cuz i ran out of time  from the lag....
